articles.title: Democratic Republic of the Congo declares the end to its 11th Ebola outbreak - CNN
articles.description: The Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) officially declared the end of its 11th Ebola outbreak Wednesday, six months after the first cases of the deadly virus were reported.
